Title: Oil prices hold steady on supply risks, expected decision from OPEC+ on output increase
Body:
Oil prices held steady on Wednesday after the U.S. barred Chevron Corp. CVX-N from exporting crude from Venezuela, but an expected decision from OPEC+ later this week to increase production in July capped gains.
